titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Rice University Administrative Policies collection, 1963-2003 UA 203
titlestmt.author: Lee Pecht

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-10-17 16:23:41 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.abstract: Contains memoranda on organization, faculty, student, research, human resource, and general policies of Rice University, divided into folders by each policy section.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Historically, Rice University policies and policy changes were developed in the various departments of the University and submitted to the President's office for approval in paper form. In 1995, a project was begun by faculty member Prentiss Riddle to compile a comprehenisve collection of all university policies and provide them in a computer readable format.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains memoranda on organization, faculty, student, research, human resources, and general policies of Rice University, divided into folders by each policy section.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.
Stored offsite at the Library Service Center and require 24-hour notice for retrieval. Please contact the Woodson Research Center at 713-348-2586 or woodson@rice.edu for more information.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: No future additions are expected for this material.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rice University Administrative Policies collection, UA 203, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from the Administrative Policies Records must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

did.unittitle: 100 - Current and Non-Current Lists of Policy Memoranda

204 - General Guidelines for Outside Activities for Faculty Members; Faculty Family, Medical, and Professional Leaves
210 - Summer Research Grants for Assistant Professors in Humanities

317 - New Technology Reporting for NASA Contracts
326 - Human Health and Safety in the Performance of Research
332 - Disclosure Policy for Reporting Significant Financial Interests Related to Proposed or Funded Projects from the NSF or PHS
406 - Staff Promotion and Recruitment Policy and Procedures

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Also included: two reports from the Ad Hoc Committee on the Alcohol Policy
